sync_additional_fields.title: Sync Additional Fields
sync_additional_fields.description: Flag to indicate if additional fields should be synced

reject_unauthorized.title: Reject Unauthorized
reject_unauthorized.description: Flag to indicate if unauthorized requests should be rejected

use_user_prefix_search.title: Use User Prefix Search
use_user_prefix_search.description: Flag to indicate if user prefix search should be used (optional)

project_keys.title: Project Keys
project_keys.description: Project keys to filter the search (optional)

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: Number of days to cutoff for syncing (optional)

cutoff_lag_days.title: Cutoff Lag Days
cutoff_lag_days.description: Lag days to consider for cutoff (optional)

board_ids.title: Board IDs
board_ids.description: Board IDs to filter the search (optional)

run_mode.title: Run Mode
run_mode.description: Run mode for selecting the usage of the connector

project_bucket_id.title: Bucket Number
project_bucket_id.description: Bucket number for this source to determine which portion of projects and boards to pull. Use it when distributing the load between multiple sources.

project_bucket_total.title: Total Number of Buckets
project_bucket_total.description: Total number of buckets to distribute projects and boards across. Use it when distributing the load between multiple sources
